room_calc

class room_calc.room(volume, surface, sub_surface, alpha, sub_alpha, peopleDescription, numberOfPeople, use)

Class inheriting all characteristics of the room as well as calculation and plotting functionality.

__init__(volume, surface, sub_surface, alpha, sub_alpha, peopleDescription, numberOfPeople, use)

Constructor for room object.

Parameters

  • volume (int) – Volume of the room in cubic meters

  • surface (dict of str: int) – Dictionary with the names of the main surfaces as keys and their areas in square meters as values

  • sub_surface (dict of str: list of int) – Dictionary with the names of the main surfaces as keys and lists of their subsurface areas in square meters as values

  • alpha (dict of str: list of float) – Dictionary with octave bands as keys and lists of absorption coefficients of main surfaces as values

  • sub_alpha (dict of str: dict of str: list of float) – Dictionary of Dictionarys. With octave bands as first keys, main surfaces as second keys and lists of absorption coefficients of sub surfaces as values

  • peopleDescription (list of str) – List of descriptions of people in the room based on DIN18041

  • numberOfPeople (list of int) – List of int for different kind of people in the room

  • use (str) – Usecase for the room based on DIN18041

Returns

Returns a room instance, which handles all calculations

Return type

class: room

criticalDistance()

Returns the critical distance, at which energy densities of the direct and reflected soundfield are equal. Makes use of an approximate formula based on statistical acoustics in a diffuse soundfield.

Returns

critical distance in meters

Return type

float

equivalentAbsorptionSurface_walls()

Returns equivalent absorption surface for the walls by calculating the equivalent absorption surface for every wall and summing them. People and air are not taken into account.

Returns

equivalent absoprtion surface in square meters

Return type

float

equivalentAbsorptionSurface_people()

Returns equivalent absorption surface for the people in the room based on the number of people and their specification regarding age and position (e.g. standing, sitting). Data retrieved from Table A.1 in DIN 18041.

Returns

equivalent absorption surface of the people in the room in square meters

Return type

float

equivalentAbsorptionSurface_air()

Returns equivalent absorption surface resulting from the dampening in air.

Returns

equivalent absorption surface of the air in square meters

Return type

float

equivalentAbsorptionSurface()

Returns sum of all equivalent absorption surfaces (walls, people, air).

Returns

sum of equivalent absorption surfaces in square meters

Return type

float

reverberationTime()

Returns the reverberation time calculated by the formula of Sabine.

Returns

reverberation time in s

Return type

float

reverberationTime_ratio()

Returns the ratio of calculated reverberation time to wanted reverberation time. Wanted reverberation time is based on the rooms use case and its volume.

Returns

Ratio calculated to wanted reverberation time, Error message (when reverberation time is not inside the given boundaries)

Return type

float, list

plot_reverberationTime()

Creates a plot presenting the reverberation time in octave bands using plotly.

Returns

plot of reverberation time

Return type

plotly figure

plot_reverberationTime_ratio()

Creates a plot presenting the calculated reverberation time in comparison to the wanted reverberation time. Also showing the allowed deviations in octave bands using plotly.

Returns

plot comparing calculated and wanted reverberation time

Return type

plotly figure
